articles.title: Michael J. Fox Will Be Awarded Honorary Oscar For Parkinson's Advocacy - IGN
articles.description: Back to the Future star Michael J. Fox will be awarded an honorary Oscar for his work as an advocate of Parkinson's research.
articles.content:
Back to the Future star Michael J. Fox is being awarded an honorary Oscar.
The award, which is to be presented to Fox on June 15, 2022, will honor the 61-year-old actor for his tireless efforts to c… [+2155 chars]
